info.title: Bluesky Social
info.description: Specification for the Bluesky Social endpoints. Includes endpoints for soprocial interaction, admin, chat, ATProto, and ozone.

get.description: Get private preferences attached to the current account.

get.x-ms-summary: Fetch a detailed profile of an actor.
get.description: Retrieve a detailed profile view of an actor using their handle or DID.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the account to fetch the profile of.

profile.description: Detailed profile information of the actor.

get.description: Get detailed profile views of multiple actors.

parameters.name: actors
parameters.description: Actor Identifier

get.x-ms-summary: Get Suggested Actors
get.description: Get a list of suggested actors.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

get.x-ms-summary: Search Actors
get.description: Find actors (profiles) matching search criteria.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string. Syntax, phrase, boolean, and faceting is unspecified, but Lucene query syntax is recommended.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of actors to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

get.description: Retrieve account suggestions for typeahead search.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search term used for typeahead results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

actors.description: An array of minimal actor details matching the typeahead search.

get.x-ms-summary: Get information about a feed generator
get.description: Get information about a feed generator.

get.x-ms-summary: Fetch feeds created by an actor.
get.description: Get a list of feeds created by the actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the actor whose feeds are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of feeds to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

feeds.description: List of feeds created by the actor.

get.summary: Get a list of posts liked by an actor
get.x-ms-summary: Get a list of posts liked by an actor
get.description: Get a list of posts liked by an actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Identifier of the actor whose likes are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results.

feed.description: List of posts liked by the actor.

get.description: Get a view of an actor's 'author feed.'

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The identifier of the actor whose author feed to fetch.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to fetch.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combinations of post/repost types to include in response.

parameters.name: includePins
parameters.description: Whether to include pinned posts in the response.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a hydrated feed.
get.description: Get a hydrated feed from an actor's selected feed generator.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: The URI of the feed generator.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the actor requesting the feed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

feed.description: Array of posts in the feed.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve details about a feed generator.
get.description: Get information about a feed generator.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: AT-URI of the feed generator record.

isOnline.description: Indicates whether the feed generator service has been online recently.

isValid.description: Indicates whether the feed generator service is compatible with the record declaration.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve details about multiple feed generators.
get.description: Get information about a list of feed generators.

parameters.name: feeds
parameters.description: A list of AT-URIs representing the feed generators to retrieve information for.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a skeleton of a feed from a generator.
get.description: Get a skeleton of a feed provided by a feed generator.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: Reference to feed generator record describing the specific feed being requested.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor

get.x-ms-summary: Get like records referencing a subject.
get.description: Get like records which reference a subject (by AT-URI and CID).

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: AT-URI of the subject (e.g., a post record).

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: CID of the subject record (specific version of record), to filter likes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor

get.x-ms-summary: Get List Feed
get.description: Get a feed of recent posts from a list.

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: Reference (AT-URI) to the list record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Optional pagination mechanism.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

feed.description: Array of posts in the feed.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve post views for specified posts.
get.description: Gets post views for a specified list of posts.

parameters.name: uris
parameters.description: List of post AT-URIs to return hydrated views for.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve posts in a thread.
get.description: Get posts in a thread.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: Reference (AT-URI) to post record.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: How many levels of reply depth should be included in response.

parameters.name: parentHeight
parameters.description: How many levels of parent (and grandparent, etc) post to include.

thread.description: Thread details for the requested post.

get.x-ms-summary: Get Quotes
get.description: Get a list of quotes for a given post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: Reference (AT-URI) of the post record.

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: If supplied, filters to quotes of specific version (by CID) of the post record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of quotes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Optional pagination mechanism.

cid.description: Specific version (CID) of the post record.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

posts.description: Array of post views for quotes.

get.x-ms-summary: Get Reposted By
get.description: Get a list of reposts for a given post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: Reference (AT-URI) of the post record.

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: If supplied, filters to reposts of specific version (by CID) of the post record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reposts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Optional pagination mechanism.

cid.description: Specific version (CID) of the post record.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

repostedBy.description: Array of profiles who reposted the post.

get.x-ms-summary: Fetch suggested feeds for the account.
get.description: Retrieve a list of suggested feeds for the requesting account.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of suggested feeds to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

feeds.description: List of suggested feeds for the account.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve home timeline.
get.description: Get a view of the requesting account's home timeline.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: Variant 'algorithm' for the timeline.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

feed.description: Array of posts in the timeline.

get.x-ms-summary: Find posts matching search criteria.
get.description: Find posts matching search criteria, returning views of those posts.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies the ranking order of results.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filter results for posts after the indicated datetime (inclusive).

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Filter results for posts before the indicated datetime (not inclusive).

parameters.name: mentions
parameters.description: Filter to posts which mention the given account.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Filter to posts by the given account. Handles are resolved to DID before query-time.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Filter to posts in the given language.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Filter to posts with URLs.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Filter to posts with links.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter to posts with the given tag (hashtag).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Optional pagination mechanism.

post.description: Send information about interactions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload containing interactions to send.

get.summary: Get a list of starter packs created by the actor
get.x-ms-summary: Get Actor Starter Packs
get.description: Get a list of starter packs created by the actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The actor identifier for which to retrieve starter packs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of starter packs to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve accounts following a specified actor.
get.description: Enumerate accounts that follow a specified actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the actor whose followers are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of followers to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

subject.description: Profile details of the actor whose followers are retrieved.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

followers.description: List of accounts following the specified actor.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve accounts followed by a specified actor.
get.description: Enumerates accounts that a specified actor follows.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the actor whose follows are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of accounts to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

subject.description: Profile details of the actor whose follows are retrieved.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

items.description: List of accounts followed by the specified actor.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve known followers of an account.
get.description: Retrieve followers for a specific account that are also followed by the viewer.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the actor whose followers are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of followers to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

subject.description: Profile details of the subject actor.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

followers.description: List of followers who are also followed by the viewer.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor to retrieve the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve the lists created by a specified account.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Cursor to retrieve the next set of results.

get.summary: Get public relationships between one account, and a list of other accounts
get.x-ms-summary: Get Relationships
get.description: Get public relationships between one account, and a list of other accounts.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Primary account requesting relationships for.

parameters.name: others
parameters.description: List of 'other' accounts to be related back to the primary.

actor.description: The DID of the primary account.

relationships.description: List of relationships between the actor and other accounts.

type.description: The type of relationship or status.

get.description: Gets a view of a starter pack based on the provided reference (AT-URI).

parameters.name: starterPack
parameters.description: Reference (AT-URI) of the starter pack record.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve views for a list of starter packs.
get.description: Get detailed views for a list of starter packs based on the provided URIs.

parameters.name: uris
parameters.description: List of AT-URIs for the starter packs (maximum 25 items).

get.x-ms-summary: Get Suggested Follows by Actor
get.description: Enumerates follows similar to a given account.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The account identifier for which similar follows are suggested.

suggestions.description: List of suggested profiles to follow.

isFallback.description: Indicates if the results are fallback generic suggestions.

post.x-ms-summary: Create a mute relationship for a specified account.
post.description: Creates a mute relationship for the specified account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload to specify the account to mute.

actor.description: Identifier of the account to be muted.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.x-ms-summary: Create a mute relationship for a specified list of accounts.
post.description: Creates a mute relationship for the specified list of accounts.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload specifying the list of accounts to mute.

list.description: URI reference to the list of accounts to be muted.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.x-ms-summary: Mute a thread to prevent notifications from it and its children.
post.description: Mutes a thread preventing notifications from the thread and any of its children.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload specifying the root of the thread to mute.

root.description: URI reference to the root of the thread to mute.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.description: Unmutes the specified account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload specifying the actor to unmute.

actor.description: The identifier (AT-identifier) of the actor to unmute.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.x-ms-summary: Unmute the specified list of accounts.
post.description: Unmutes the specified list of accounts.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload specifying the list of accounts to unmute.

list.description: The URI of the list to unmute.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.description: Unmutes the specified thread.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload specifying the thread to unmute.

root.description: The URI of the root thread to unmute.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

get.summary: Count the number of unread notifications for the requesting account
get.description: Count the number of unread notifications for the requesting account.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Specifies if only high-priority notifications should be counted.

parameters.name: seenAt
parameters.description: Count notifications seen after the provided timestamp.

get.x-ms-summary: List Notifications
get.description: Enumerate notifications for the requesting account.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of notifications to return.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Filter notifications by priority status.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of notifications.

parameters.name: seenAt
parameters.description: Filter notifications seen at or after the specified date-time.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

priority.description: Indicates if priority notifications are included.

seenAt.description: Timestamp indicating when notifications were last seen.

post.description: Set notification-related preferences for an account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The notification preferences to set for the account.

priority.description: Indicates if priority notifications should be enabled.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

post.description: Register to receive push notifications.

serviceDid.description: The DID of the push notification service.

platform.description: The platform for the push notification.

appId.description: Identifier for the app requesting push notifications.

success.description: Indicates if the registration was successful.

post.summary: Notify server that the requesting account has seen notifications
post.description: Notify server that the requesting account has seen notifications.

seenAt.description: Timestamp indicating when notifications were seen.

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

get.summary: Get status details for a video processing job
get.x-ms-summary: Get status details for a video processing job
get.description: Get status details for a video processing job.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the video processing job to retrieve the status for.

get.summary: Get video upload limits for the authenticated user
get.x-ms-summary: Get video upload limits for the authenticated user.
get.description: Get video upload limits for the authenticated user.

canUpload.description: Indicates if the user can upload videos.

remainingDailyVideos.description: Number of videos the user can still upload today.

remainingDailyBytes.description: Remaining data size in bytes available for uploads today.

message.description: Additional information regarding the upload limits.

post.x-ms-summary: Upload and process a video on the PDS.
post.description: Upload a video to be processed and stored on the PDS.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Binary video file to be uploaded and processed.

jobStatus.description: The status of the video processing job.

post.description: Delete an account.
Set the private preferences attached to the account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The preferences to attach to the account.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

get.description: Export account data.

post.description: Delete a message for the user who sent it.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details of the message to be deleted.

convoId.description: The ID of the conversation containing the message to be deleted.

messageId.description: The ID of the message to be deleted.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a specific conversation.
get.description: Get a conversation based on the provided conversation ID.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to retrieve.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a conversation for specific members.
get.description: Get a conversation for one or many members.

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: List of DID identifiers for the members of the conversation.

get.description: Retrieve the log of actions and messages in a conversation.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of logs.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve messages in a conversation.
get.description: Get a list of messages from a specific conversation.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The ID of the conversation to retrieve messages from.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of messages.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

items.description: List of messages in the conversation.

post.description: Leave a conversation by specifying its ID.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details of the conversation to leave.

convoId.description: The ID of the conversation to leave.
The ID of the conversation that was left.

rev.description: The revision identifier of the conversation.

get.x-ms-summary: Retrieve a list of conversations.
get.description: List conversations.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of conversations to return (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of results.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

id.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

rev.description: The revision identifier of the conversation.

members.description: List of members in the conversation.

muted.description: Indicates whether the conversation is muted.

opened.description: Indicates whether the conversation has been opened.

unreadCount.description: The count of unread messages in the conversation.

200.x-ms-summary: Successful response containing a list of conversations.

post.description: Mute a conversation.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details of the conversation to be muted.

convoId.description: The ID of the conversation to be muted.

post.description: Send a single message to a specific conversation.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The conversation ID and the message to be sent.

post.description: Create an authentication session..

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request payload containing user credentials

emailConfirmed.description: Indicator if the email is confirmed.

emailAuthFactor.description: Indicator if email is used for authentication.

active.description: Indicates if the session is active.

post.x-ms-summary: Refresh a session and renew tokens.
post.description: Refresh an authentication session to obtain a new access token and refresh token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The refresh token for renewing the session.

refreshJwt.description: The refresh token provided during session creation

active.description: Indicates if the session is active.

get.description: Describe the credentials that should be included in the DID doc of an account that is migrating to this service.

Validates a PLC operation to ensure that it doesn't violate a service's constraints.

get.x-ms-summary: Fetch dynamic schema for the record view.
get.description: Returns dynamic schema information for the record view.

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: Identifier for the record.

items.description: A preference entry in the user's settings.

labelerDid.description: Which labeler does this preference apply to?

birthDate.description: The birth date of account owner.

feed.description: The URI of the feed, or an identifier which describes the feed.

hideRepliesByUnfollowed.description: Hide replies in the feed if they are not by followed users.

hideQuotePosts.description: Hide quote posts in the feed.

prioritizeFollowedUsers.description: Show followed users at the top of all replies.

mutedWord.description: A word that the account owner has muted.

actorTarget.description: Groups of users to apply the muted word to. If undefined, applies to all users.

expiresAt.description: The date and time at which the muted word will expire and no longer be applied.

bskyAppStatePref.description: A grab bag of state that's specific to the bsky.app program.

bskyAppProgressGuide.description: If set, an active progress guide.

nux.description: A new user experiences (NUX) storage object

data.description: Arbitrary data for the NUX. 300-character limit.

expiresAt.description: The date and time at which the NUX will expire and completed.

profileVisibility.description: The visibility of the user's profile (e.g., 'public', 'private').

messagePermissions.description: Who can send messages to the user (e.g., 'anyone', 'contacts').

FeedItem.description: Details of a single feed item.

reason.description: Reason for including the post in the feed.

uri.description: The unique URI of the post.

cid.description: The content identifier (CID) of the post.

record.description: The content record of the post.

embed.description: Embedded content associated with the post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of times the post has been reposted.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

repost.description: Viewer's repost action ID, if applicable.

like.description: Viewer's like action ID, if applicable.

threadMuted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the thread.

replyDisabled.description: Whether replies are disabled for the post.

embeddingDisabled.description: Whether embedding is disabled for the post.

threadgate.description: Details about thread-related restrictions or lists.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

labeler.description: Indicates if the profile is a labeler.

repost.description: URI of the viewer's repost of the post.

like.description: URI of the viewer's like of the post.

threadMuted.description: Indicates if the thread is muted by the viewer.

pinned.description: Indicates if the post is pinned.

threadgate.description: Access restrictions and details for a thread.

listItemCount.description: Count of items in the list.

labels.description: Labels associated with the list item.

mutedByList.description: Details of a list that muted the actor.

uri.description: URI of the list that muted the actor.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI for the list.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the list was indexed.

blockingByList.description: Details of a list that blocks the actor.

uri.description: URI of the list that blocks the actor.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI for the list.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the list was indexed.

viewerMetadata.description: Metadata about the viewer's relationship to the actor.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted by the viewer.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

blocking.description: Indicates if the viewer is blocking the actor.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

reply.description: Metadata about a reply in a conversation thread.

parent.description: Parent post to which this reply was made.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI of the author.

cid.description: The content identifier (CID) of the list.

purpose.description: The purpose or category of the list.

listItemCount.description: The number of items in the list.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the list.

blocked.description: Whether the viewer has blocked the list.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the list was indexed.

cid.description: The content identifier (CID) of the list.

purpose.description: The purpose or category of the list.

listItemCount.description: The number of items in the list.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the list was created.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the list was indexed.

Author.description: Details about the author of the post.

did.description: The decentralized identifier (DID) of the author.

displayName.description: The display name of the author.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

lists.description: Number of lists associated with the author.

feedgens.description: Number of feed generators associated with the author.

starterPacks.description: Number of starter packs associated with the author.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

root.description: Root post reference, which can be a postView, notFoundPost, or blockedPost.

parent.description: Parent post reference, which can be a postView, notFoundPost, or blockedPost.

postReplyRef.description: References the root and parent of a post reply.

strongRef.description: Defines a strong reference with a URI and CID.

uri.description: The URI of the strong reference.

cid.description: The CID of the strong reference.

appViewerState.description: Metadata about the requesting account's relationship with the subject account.

label.description: Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).

src.description: DID of the actor who created this label.

uri.description: AT URI of the record, repo (account), or other resource that this label applies to.

cid.description: Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.

val.description: The short string name of the value or type of this label.

neg.description: If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label.

cts.description: Timestamp when this label was created.

exp.description: Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).

messagesSent.description: The number of messages sent by the actor.

messagesReceived.description: The number of messages received by the actor.

convos.description: The total number of conversations the actor has participated in.

convosStarted.description: The number of conversations started by the actor.

knownFollowers.description: The subject's followers whom you also follow.

avatar.description: URI of the actor's avatar image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of the actor's profile creation.

labels.description: Array of labels associated with the actor.

chatDisabled.description: Indicates if the actor cannot actively participate in conversations.

listPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the list.

type.description: The type of the list purpose.

modlist.description: A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action on.

curatelist.description: A list of actors used for curation purposes.

convoView.description: Represents a view of a conversation.

id.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

rev.description: The revision identifier of the conversation.

members.description: List of members in the conversation.

lastMessage.description: The last message in the conversation.

id.description: The unique identifier of the message.

content.description: The content of the last message.

timestamp.description: The time when the last message was sent.

muted.description: Indicates whether the conversation is muted.

opened.description: Indicates whether the conversation has been opened.

unreadCount.description: The count of unread messages in the conversation.

batchItem.description: Represents a batch item for sending a message.

record.description: Dynamic schema for the record view.

richtextFacet.description: Annotation of a sub-string within rich text.

items.description: Feature of the rich text facet.

richTextFacetByteSlice.description: Specifies the sub-string range a facet feature applies to.

byteStart.description: The starting byte of the range.

byteEnd.description: The ending byte of the range.

id.description: The ID of the deleted message.

rev.description: The revision ID of the deleted message.

sentAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

lastMessage.description: Represents the last message in a conversation.

id.description: The unique identifier of the message.

text.description: The text content of the message.

sender.description: The identifier of the message sender.

sentAt.description: The time at which the message was sent.

reason.description: Reason for the feed post. Can be either a repost or a pin.

details.description: Additional details specific to the reason type. Matches either reasonRepost or reasonPin.

feedContext.description: Context provided by feed generator that may be passed back alongside interactions.
Context on a feed item originally supplied by the feed generator on getFeedSkeleton.

requestLess.description: Request that less content like the given feed item be shown in the feed.

requestMore.description: Request that more content like the given feed item be shown in the feed.

clickthroughItem.description: User clicked through to the feed item

clickthroughAuthor.description: User clicked through to the author of the feed item

clickthroughReposter.description: User clicked through to the reposter of the feed item

clickthroughEmbed.description: User clicked through to the embedded content of the feed item

interactionSeen.description: Feed item was seen by user

interactionReply.description: User replied to the feed item

post.description: The AT-URI of the post.

feedContext.description: Context passed through to the client and returned to the feed generator alongside interactions.

reasonType.description: Reason type for the moderation report. One of the predefined reasons.

reasonSpam.description: Spam: frequent unwanted promotion, replies, mentions

reasonViolation.description: Direct violation of server rules, laws, terms of service

reasonRude.description: Rude, harassing, explicit, or otherwise unwelcoming behavior

reasonOther.description: Other: reports not falling under another report category

reasonAppeal.description: Appeal: appeal a previously taken moderation action

selfLabels.description: Metadata tags on an atproto record, published by the author within the record.

selfLabel.description: Metadata tag on an atproto record, published by the author within the record.

val.description: The short string name of the value or type of this label.

labelValueDefinition.description: Declares a label value and its expected interpretations and behaviors.

identifier.description: The value of the label being defined. Must only include lowercase ascii and the '-' character ([a-z-]+).

severity.description: How should a client visually convey this label? inform, alert, warning.

blurs.description: What should this label hide in the UI, if applied? content, media, none.

defaultSetting.description: The default setting for this label.

adultOnly.description: Does the user need to have adult content enabled in order to configure this label?

labelValueDefinitionStrings.description: Strings which describe the label in the UI, localized into a specific language.

lang.description: The code of the language these strings are written in.

name.description: A short human-readable name for the label.

description.description: A longer description of what the label means and why it might be applied.

state.description: The state of the video processing job.

subject.description: Content of the template, can contain markdown and variable placeholders.

contentMarkdown.description: Subject of the message, used in emails.

lastUpdatedBy.description: DID of the user who last updated the template.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subject status.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the subject status was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the subject status was last updated.

reviewState.description: The review state of the subject.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp referencing when the last update was made to the moderation status of the subject

createdAt.description: Timestamp referencing the first moderation status impacting event was emitted on the subject

lastAppealedAt.description: Timestamp referencing when the author of the subject appealed a moderation action

appealed.description: True indicates that the a previously taken moderator action was appealed against by content author

event.description: Represents one of the moderation event types.

subject.description: Represents one of the subject references.

type.description: Type of result for the write operation.

applyWrites.create.description: Operation which creates a new record.

applyWrites.update.description: Operation which updates an existing record.

applyWrites.delete.description: Operation which deletes an existing record.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp of when the entity was deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier for the moderation event.

subject.description: The subject of the moderation event.

subjectBlobs.description: Details about the blobs associated with the subject.

createdBy.description: The DID of the user who created the event.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

size.description: Size of the blob in bytes.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the blob was created.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

width.description: Width of the video in pixels.

height.description: Height of the video in pixels.

length.description: Length of the video in seconds.

reviewedBy.description: DID of the moderator who reviewed the blob.

reviewedAt.description: Timestamp when the blob was reviewed.

status.description: True or false value indicating why account is inactive..

thumb.description: Fully-qualified URL where a thumbnail of the image can be fetched.

fullsize.description: Fully-qualified URL where a large version of the image can be fetched.

alt.description: Alt text description of the image, for accessibility.

aspectRatio.description: width:height represents an aspect ratio. Can be approximate.

record.description: The record can be one of several types.

value.description: The specific record value (structure not detailed in this schema).

media.description: The media associated with the record.

alt.description: Alt text description of the image, for accessibility.

media.description: The media associated with the record view.

alt.description: Alt text description of the image, for accessibility.

errorResponse.description: Standard error response for failed requests.

error.description: Type of error encountered during the request.

code.description: Optional error code, such as an HTTP status code.

details.description: Additional information about the error for debugging purposes.
